name: NI-9144 (CompactRIO)
Notes:
• Known Issues, Readmes, etc. (Release Notes)
  • Before using NI-RIO on Linux, you must begin development on a computer running Windows. Refer to the NI-RIO for Linux Readme.
  • **Select NI drivers are incompatible with default IOMMU settings on Linux Kernel 6.8 and later, resulting in generic hardware or internal errors while using NI hardware. Consult the NI Platform on Linux Desktop User Manual for more information.
